name: GOBI (Saar Ben Horin, Itai Valach)
description:
Gobi is an isometric survival strategy game located in Mongolia.

You may die from hypothermia when you fall into the frozen lake; therefore stay as high as possible.

summon your eagles to destory the map and your enemies.

the last player to stay alive wins.

CONTROLS:

SPACE Eagle call (hold for more power)Arrow keys Movement (each press moves)

CREDITS:

Or TamirDesignSaar Ben Horin @saarbh
